text: Allahara pratisrauti arau manuhara pratisrautira bahirae sihamtaka yaâ€™te'i poraa gaiche tate'i sihamta lanchita haiche. Arau sihamta allahara kraodhara patra haiche lagate sihamtara oparata daraidra nirdharana karai diya haiche; e'ito e'i babe ye, sihamta allahara ayatasamuhara lagata kupharai karaichila arau an'yayabharae nabisakalaka hatya karaichila; seya e'i babe ye, sihamta abadhya haichila arau simalanghana karaichila
